about_the_game:
Dr. Finklestein's Marvelous Room is a story based sandbox adventure. Join Dr. Finklestein in a last ditch attempt to save humanity from certain doom with his daring plan, "The Marvelous Room Experiment".

THE END OF THE WORLD


The International Space Agency (INSA) has made a chilling discovery. In 6 months, 14 days, 2 hours and 47 seconds, the world will end. An enigmatic cosmic entity, dubbed by scientists as the "Dark Doodad," is on a cosmic rampage, devouring stars at the farthest reaches of the universe. Even worse, now its hungry gaze is set on our solar system. Despite numerous efforts to divert its path, all have failed. Humanity teeters on the brink of annihilation...

DR. GUMPHREY FINKLESTEIN


However, humanity refuses to go down without a fight. Dr. Gumphrey Finklestein, a distinguished scientist at INSA, has devised a daring plan to change fate – "The Marvelous Room Experiment." Within a 10m x 8m x 5m chamber lies humanity's last hope to thwart the Dark Doodad.

THE MARVELOUS ROOM EXPERIMENT


You are the sole participant chosen by Dr. Finklestein. Your mission is clear: carefully inspect and validate the functionality of 50 items, hand selected and voted on by our pool of volunteers.



Whether it's a book, a piano, or a playable arcade cabinet, you must ensure that each item lives up to its description. These items will vary greatly, and you need to be prepared to deal with their unique attributes.



Only when all 50 items have been successfully processed into the Room can we hope to turn the tide against the Dark Doodad.

RACE AGAINST TIME


The clock is ticking. With only hours to spare, will you and Dr. Finklestein be able to save the world from impending doom? The future of humanity is in your hands...

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux kernel 3.x or newer
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500x / Intel i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 8GB Memory
  • Additional Notes: glibc 2.17 or newer is required

name: Dr. Finklestein's Marvelous Room

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 4 Core Processor @ 3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 8GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Dr. Finklestein's Marvelous Room is a community run experimental story game. With the end of the world fast approaching, Dr. Gumphrey Finklestein announces his plans for a groundbreaking scientific experiment. What will it entail? Does even he know?
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Korean
*languages with full audio support
